Description: General Changes

* Reworked how friend invites work inside the client. You must now be Steam friends with a person to invite them. This has a friend recency requirement as well as your friend needing to not be a limited steam user. Previous requests do not need to be resubmitted.
* Replaced the {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=neutral}} vaults with a new model, the Sinner's Sacrifice
* Added the ability to change builds while in-game
* Build descriptions can now be seen in-game via a tooltip
* Added {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=neutrals}} to Hero Sandbox (the small room in the back on the right)
* Added new objective health bars for Guardians and {{PageRef|Walker}}s
* Added Match History link to the top right
* You can now move active item slots on the HUD while holding alt/tab
* Improved visibility of the voice icon indicating who is talking
* Hero icons on the minimap are scaled up a little when holding alt
* Removed Pause cooldown in private bot matches and tutorial/sandbox
* Improved networking when there is packet loss or jitter
* {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=Soul}} Vessel dropped from heroes (after killing neutrals) now scales in size based on how many {{PageRef|{{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=Soul}}s|alt_name=souls}} are inside
* Improved {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}'s trap visibility
* Increased the speed of Guardian's melee attacks
* Changed Guardian's behavior to only attempt melee when a unit is within 6m but still do damage to units in 12m range
* Candle trooper health bars now stick around at 1% when they are in self destruct mode to make it more clear they can still be shot
* {{PageRef|Infernus}}'s {{PageRef|Afterburn}} now shows portraits of enemies that are burning for the full duration
* Improved menu UI sound feedback
* Player's icon is highlighted in the top bar
* Added UI sound effects for team and opponent deaths
* Added {{PageRef|Kinetic Carbine}} charge audio loop
* Updated {{PageRef|Vindicta}} {{PageRef|Flight}} sound effects
* Added {{PageRef|Vindicta}} {{PageRef|Assassinate}} sound effect for targeted players
* Improved visuals for {{PageRef|Kelvin}}'s gun projectile
* Fixed some visual issues with {{PageRef|Ice Path}}
* Added AoE effect to {{PageRef|Pocket}}'s {{PageRef|Barrage}}
* Updated weapon buff effect in {{PageRef|Pocket}}'s {{PageRef|Flying Cloak}} upgrade
* Visual effects updates for melee lifesteal items
* Fixed {{PageRef|Power Slash}} sometimes getting stuck on nearby geometry
* Updated sound effects for the Sinner's Sacrifice
* Updated {{PageRef|Pocket}}'s Enchanted Satchel delay and explode sounds
* Updated {{PageRef|Pocket}}'s {{PageRef|Barrage}} cast and impact sounds
* Updated {{PageRef|Warden}}'s {{PageRef|Binding Word}} delay and impact sounds
* Fixed {{PageRef|Dynamo}}'s {{PageRef|Quantum Entanglement}} going through ceilings sometimes
* Fixed an HTML exploit with chat
* Fixed not being able to place deployable abilities at certain angles
* Fixed moving active item slots causing the player to say "[ITEM] is on cooldown"
* Fixed training {{PageRef|Ivy}}'s True Form causing you to get healed
* Fixed a bug with {{PageRef|Malice}} firing slightly upward
* Changed collision on barrel stand stacks to block bullets
* Added zapper on factory outpost building
* Removed roof duct on top of low building besides inner {{PageRef|Walker}}
* Removed street lamp post that was causing heroes to get stuck near inner lane Guardian
* Added lights to outer lane Cosmic Veil tunnels
* More heroes will now compliment on good uses of ultimates instead of just saying "good work"
* Fixed more instances of heroes being called out by the wrong name
Misc Gameplay
* Base hero kill value increased from 150 to 225
* {{PageRef|Rejuvenator|alt_name=Rejuv}} duration reduced from 4 to 3 minutes
* {{PageRef|Rejuvenator|alt_name=Rejuv}} buff no longer increases your ammo
* {{PageRef|Rejuvenator|alt_name=Rejuv}} now causes all your candle troopers to have double health for 3 minutes
* {{PageRef|Mid-Boss|alt_name=Mid Boss}} can now only be damaged by enemies inside the bottom pit
* {{PageRef|Mid-Boss|alt_name=Mid Boss}} {{PageRef|Rejuvenator|alt_name=Rejuv}} claim time reduced from 2.5s to 1.5s
* Strong {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=neutrals}} HP reduced by 20%
* Strong {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=neutrals}} {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=souls}} bounty reduced by 20%
* 4 Strong {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=Neutral}} camps in the corners of the map have been replaced with Medium {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=neutrals}}
* Vaults {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=souls}} increased from 260 to 300
* Spirit tier bonus increased from 3/6/9/12 to 4/8/12/16
* Vitality tier bonus increased from 5/10/15/20% to 8/12/16/20%
* Bullet damage falloff now maxes out at ~65m instead of ~70m
* {{PageRef|Walker}} bomb damage reduced from 300 to 200
* Moved the middle lane {{PageRef|Base Guardian}}s further out slightly

* Powerups bonus types are now split between the regular destructibles like crates/vases/etc and the {{PageRef|Golden Statue}}s. Regular ones can only roll for {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=souls}} and {{PageRef|Golden Statue}}s can only roll for buffs. Distribution of destructibles and Golden Status around the map has been adjusted a bit.
* Respawn rate for Destructibles/Statues (after initial spawn) slowed from 120s to 180s
* {{PageRef|Mid-Boss|alt_name=Mid boss}} area has reduced destructibles
* Movement Speed powerup duration increased from 12s to 30s
* Movement Speed powerup movespeed reduced from 2 to 1
* Movement Speed powerup sprint speed increased from 2 to 4
* Fire Rate powerup reduced from +20% to +15%
* Fire Rate powerup duration increased from 25s to 35s
* Health Regen powerup regen reduced from 1.5% to 1%
* Health Regen powerup duration increased from 15s to 25s
* Cooldown Reduction powerup reduced from 25% to 20%
* Extra Clip powerup reduced from 4 clips to 3
* {{PageRef|Extra Stamina}} powerup duration increased from 60s to 80s
* {{PageRef|Extra Stamina}} powerup amount reduced from 2 to 1
* Crouch movespeed increased from 4 to 4.75
* Bullet Shields now block damage from melee (similar to resistance)
* Increased the distance heroes slide when they come to the bottom of a ramp
Item Gameplay
* {{PageRef|Extra Regen}}: Regen increased from 1.75 to 2
* {{PageRef|Enduring Spirit}}: {{PageRef|Spirit Lifesteal}} reduced from +10% to +8%
* {{PageRef|Reactive Barrier}}: Cooldown reduced from 35s to 25s
* {{PageRef|Decay}} changed from 2.2% of Max Health to 2.4% Current Health (less damage when the target is low, and non-lethal now)
* {{PageRef|Healbane}} moved from Spirit tree to Vitality tree
* {{PageRef|Healbane}} now gives +50 Health
* {{PageRef|Spirit Lifesteal}}: Reduced from +25% to +23%
* {{PageRef|Soul Shredder Bullets}}: Spirit Amp reduced from +12% to +10%
* {{PageRef|Cold Front}}: cooldown reduced from 40s to 32s
* {{PageRef|Improved Cooldown}}: HP Regen reduced from 2 to 1.5
* {{PageRef|Knockdown}}: No longer provides +2 Sprint
* {{PageRef|Knockdown}}: Now provides +1 Stamina
* Shifting Shroud: Cooldown reduced from 45s to 35s
* Shifting Shroud: Bonus spirit duration increased from 6s to 10s
* {{PageRef|Sharpshooter}}: Damage falloff bonus reduced from 20% to 15%
* {{PageRef|Metal Skin}} duration reduced from 4s to 3s
* {{PageRef|Metal Skin}} cooldown increased from 25s to 30s
* {{PageRef|Intensifying Magazine}}: Time for Max Damage reduced from 4s to 3.5s
* {{PageRef|Torment Pulse}}: Interval improved from 2s to 1.5s
* {{PageRef|Torment Pulse}}: Damage per pulse reduced from 45 to 40 (total dps from 22.5 to 26.6)
* {{PageRef|Torment Pulse}}: HP bonus reduced from +150 to +125
* {{PageRef|Majestic Leap}}: Velocity increased from 22.5 to 27
* {{PageRef|Leech}}: {{PageRef|Spirit Lifesteal}} reduced from +35% to +33%
* {{PageRef|Refresher}}: No longer has cast time (was 1s)
* {{PageRef|Mystic Reverb}}: Fixed the damage being reduced by armor twice
* {{PageRef|Mystic Reverb}}: Damage reduced from 35% to 30%
* {{PageRef|Curse}}: No longer prevents stamina usage
* {{PageRef|Curse}}: Now also prevents item usage
* {{PageRef|Curse}}: Duration reduced from 3.75s to 3.5s
* Diviner's Kelvar: Bullet Shield increased from 700 to 1000
* {{PageRef|Boundless Spirit}}: Spirit increased from 45 to 50
* {{PageRef|Spiritual Overflow}}: Spirit duration increased from 14s to 18s
Hero Gamepla
* {{PageRef|Abrams}}: Base HP growth reduced from 36 to 32
* {{PageRef|Abrams}}: {{PageRef|Infernal Resilience}} T2 reduced from +200 Health to +150
* {{PageRef|Abrams}}: {{PageRef|Seismic Impact}} personal brief busy state upon landing increased from 0.2s to 0.3s
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Hyper Beam}} slow now affects stamina dashes
* {{PageRef|Dynamo}}: Base HP growth reduced from 48 to 44
* {{PageRef|Dynamo}}: {{PageRef|Quantum Entanglement}} fire rate bonus reduced from +30% to +25%
* {{PageRef|Dynamo}}: {{PageRef|Singularity}} base radius increased from 8m to 10m
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Sleep Dagger}} T3 damage reduction on target improved from -30% to -40%
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Smoke Bomb}} sprint speed now instantly kicks in after casting it
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Bullet Dance}} cooldown reduced from 160s to 130s
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Bullet Dance}} T2 changed to -40s Cooldown
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Bullet Dance}} T3 changed to +1 Targets Hit Per Shot
* {{PageRef|Infernus}}: {{PageRef|Flame Dash}} cooldown increased from 30s to 38s
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: {{PageRef|Watcher's Covenant}} heal sharing reduced from 65% to 55%
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: {{PageRef|Ice Path}} sprint speed increased from +1 to +2
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: {{PageRef|Ice Path}} trail duration increased from 12s to 15s
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: {{PageRef|Frozen Shelter}} T2 changed to -40s Cooldown
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: {{PageRef|Frozen Shelter}} T3 changed to +70 Health Regen that scales with Spirit
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: {{PageRef|Frozen Shelter}} can now be dismissed early
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}}: {{PageRef|Spectral Wall}} can now be dismissed early
* {{PageRef|Pocket}}: {{PageRef|Barrage}} channel can now be interrupted by casting your other abilities
* {{PageRef|Pocket}}: {{PageRef|Barrage}} radius increased from 6m to 6.5m
* {{PageRef|Pocket}}: Enchanted Satchel cast time reduced from 0.25s to 0.15s
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Storm Cloud}} T1 increased from +30% to +35% Bullet Resist
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Flight}} spirit bonus damage reduced from +12 to +10
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Flight}} no longer has +10% bonus range to damage falloff
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Flight}} cooldown increased from 35s to 50s
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Flight}} T2 changed from +12 Spirit Damage to -15s Cooldown
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Flight}} T3 changed from +3 m/s Bonus Air Speed to +12 Spirit Damage
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: Can no longer melee while flying for extra movement
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Assassinate}} now ramps up its total damage from 50% to 100% over 1 second of being zoomed (UI indication for this)
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: Fixed being unable to move while scoped in with {{PageRef|Assassinate}}
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: Base ammo increased from 14 to 16
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: {{PageRef|Alchemical Flask}} T3 increased from +25% Fire Rate Slow to +35%
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: {{PageRef|Willpower}} T3 increased from +150 Spirit Shield to +200
